title: How to Bake a Funfetti Cake

steps.headline: Make sure you have all your ingredients for this project.
Open your cake box, and bring the bowl out, and pour the cake mix into the bowl.
Crack open two eggs and drop them into the bowl.
Bring out your measuring cup and put 1 full cup of water into the bowl.
Add 1/2 cup of vegetable oil as well
Bring out the Mixer to blend everything in together, until everything is mixed.
Take out the cake pan.
steps.description: Grease it up with vegetable oil with a napkin, so the cake won't stick to the pan while it's baking.

steps.headline: Pour the cake mix into the pan.
Check the oven's temperature.
steps.description: When the oven is at 325 F put the cake pan into the oven.

steps.headline: Wait for the cake to bake.
steps.description: The cake should take 15-25 minutes. While the cake is in the oven for 15 minutes, take it out and check it with a toothpick.

steps.headline: Let the cake cool down once fully baked for at least 15 minutes, because it just came out of the oven.
steps.description: Make sure the oven is off.

steps.headline: Cover a cookie sheet with aluminum foil.
Take the cookie sheet faced up, and take the cake pan and flip it, facing down.
steps.description: The cake should be upside down and now on your cookie sheet.

steps.headline: Let it cool down again for 10 minutes before icing.

text: Make sure you have all your ingredients for this project.  Preheat the oven to 325 degrees.  Open your cake box, and bring the bowl out, and pour the cake mix into the bowl.  Crack open two eggs and drop them into the bowl.  Bring out your measuring cup and put 1 full cup of water into the bowl. . Add 1/2 cup of vegetable oil as well  Bring out the Mixer to blend everything in together, until everything is mixed.  Take out the cake pan. Grease it up with vegetable oil with a napkin, so the cake won't stick to the pan while it's baking. Pour the cake mix into the pan.  Check the oven's temperature. When the oven is at 325 F put the cake pan into the oven. Wait for the cake to bake. The cake should take 15-25 minutes. While the cake is in the oven for 15 minutes, take it out and check it with a toothpick. Let the cake cool down once fully baked for at least 15 minutes, because it just came out of the oven. Make sure the oven is off. Cover a cookie sheet with aluminum foil.  Take the cookie sheet faced up, and take the cake pan and flip it, facing down. The cake should be upside down and now on your cookie sheet. Let it cool down again for 10 minutes before icing.  Ice the cake.  Decorate the cake. Add some rainbow sprinkles. Enjoy your cake!
